MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:12am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties locating the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:24am on Thursday, 25 March 2021
